about_the_game:
Block Trucks is a competitive, real time, ranked multiplayer racing game.
Race against opponents on a variety of challenging track surfaces, upgrade your truck and rank up as you win.

CLIMB THE RANKS



Start in BRONZE and climb the ranks as you win races. Do you have what it takes to ascend to the esteemed rank of GRAND CHAMPION?

DIVERSE UPGRADE SYSTEM



Upgrade your truck across 9 different categories to suit your racing strategy. Do you get physical and bump opponents into the barriers, or rely on raw nitro boost and engine upgrades to speed your way to victory?

TOUGH RACING CONDITIONS



Unlock challening racing conditions as you progress. Start on tarmac where grip is plenty, then slide onto sand, trawl through mud and slippery snow with each track surface testing your racing skills to the limit.

FULL AERIAL CONTROL



Execute aerial control on any axis with back flips, front flips, air roll and spins for show or line up your truck to make perfect landings for better lap times.

ON-TRACK PICKUPS



Fend off opponents as you collect valuable nitro boost, upgrade cards and cosmetic cards on the race track.

CUSTOMISE YOUR TRUCK



Stand out from the crowd with a vast array of paints, tyre sets, decals, and nitro boosts.
From common to legendary, there’s a look for every competitor.


FULL CONTROLLER SUPPORT


With comprehensive support for most gamepads and Bluetooth controllers, you’ll have all the control you need right at your fingertips.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel/AMD entry level CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel/AMD mid-level CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX12 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play.
